recipe.title: Apple Soju Cocktails
ingredients: 1 Pink Lady or Granny Smith apple
5 cups chilled tonic water (40 fluid ounces)
Equipment: an adjustable-blade slicer fitted with 1/4-inch julienne blade
instructions: Cut apple into matchsticks with slicer, discarding core, then put in a pitcher and stir in soju. Let macerate, covered and chilled, at least 30 minutes. Fill 8 (12-ounce) double Old Fashioned glasses with ice. Strain about 1/4 cup soju into each glass, then add some apple pieces to each glass. Top off drinks with tonic and serve with lime wedges.
